description:
My long-time guest director Mike shot this video with Dale more than a year ago, and I've honestly had it on my 'to do' list for a long while now. I'm glad I finally sat down and rewatched it, because it's pretty nifty little video.

In it, we meet Dale, and the first words out of his mouth are 'yes sir.' Well, ain't that a military man for you? Turns out, one of Mike's previous models, Kenny, suggested Dale for a shoot and brought him on over to Mike's place. Mike didn't know Dale from Adam until he showed up, so we're learning about Dale at the same time Mike does.

Dale stands 5'9' tall and weighs in at 165 lbs. He says he's sporting a dick that's about 7' long. He's very nervous about this whole deal and pretty serious. He's so serious that Mike has to tell him to relax, which cracks a little bit of a smile on Dale's face. He says he's ready to get started, but wants to take a shower first. Mike doesn't mind, and says he'll follow him in there and start shooting. As Dale's lathering up, Mike takes it upon himself to cop a feel -- or two, as he slips a finger into Dale's soaped-up ass.

They get back to the bed and Mike tells Dale to 'give me something good to watch.'

The guys start talking, and Mike asks Dale if he's ever had a guy blow him. Dale says: 'I've let one guy suck my cock. It was kinda weird. I don't know if I'd be able to do it again.'

So then Mike brings up how he fingered Dale in the shower. Dale quickly says: 'My girlfriend does that all the time. It feels really good.' But he says he wouldn't let a guy fuck him. Mike asks Dale if he'd be willing to try anything different, but Dale shuts him down real fast, saying that he wouldn't be comfortable doing anything more.

On the other hand, he's all for having his ass fingered -- either by his own hand, or by the helpful hand of Mike. And we get a nice little ass show here from Dale before he blows his load.
title: Dale
